answers.answer: you have no risk for a STD from kissing.See a Dr, whatever is going on is not a STD.

question: what can be caught from tongue kissing?i kissed some strange women on the mouth while drunk at a party about 6 months ago.over the last month or so, i have had a sore throat and neck. my neck has recovered for the most part  but now i am noticing some small bumps under the front of my tongue where my tongue connects to the base of my mouth. i have noticed a cluster of small bumps on the right side of my tongue near the far rear by my wisdom teeth.my sore throat persists and i feel like i have congestion in my throat but not so much in my nose and sinus area. i wake up with very bad breathe.i have been tested negative for diabetes, hiv, hepatitis, syphilis, clamidia, gonorea this week.what do these symptoms sound like?
title: kissing
